comment: This class was really interesting and I enjoyed being in it. She is an easy grader and is flexible with assignments. I would take her class again if I could!

Dr Boyd is seriously the nicest person ever. She wants you to do well and has so many ideas for new teachers. I loved going to her class. She's also really flexible and cares about us. Her assignments were fun and I can't say that about other classes. You want to take her class. Also this class was 4465.
Take Dr. Boyd!!! She is such a personable professor and really cares about her students. She is an easy grader and super flexible. I truly enjoyed going to her classes.

Dr. Boyd cares so much for students and the class is a breath of fresh air compared to the others. Take her!!! She is not a tough grader and is flexible on everything. It is always a joy to be in her class, and class always gets out early.
I loved Dr. Boyd's class. She was very knowledgeable and kind. Be sure to do all the assignments because she has a no tolerance policy on late work. I definitely recommend her!

I LOVE PROFESSOR BOYD!! She's an amazing professor. Her lectures were meaningful and applicable to teaching. I have learned A LOT in her class. I have learned ways to create a classroom community and to be a firm yet caring teacher. She is so caring and understanding! I recommend Elementary Ed majors who are in their senior year to take her!

Do NOT listen to the bad review below. That person is completely wrong. Dr. Boyd is the best. She gives you information you need to become the best teacher possible. She is friendly, approachable, caring& understanding. She gave us so much time to work on assignments in class. It made a crazy semester easier. She's one of the best professors ever.

I've had a different experience than other's. She is an Okay grader as long as you do the work. But she DOES NOT make accommodation's for anything even with doctor's notes. She will not accept a doctor's note at all. Very helpful information though I would just take this class with anyone else.

This was the best class. I have learned so much in this class and from Professor Boyd. She is an amazing professor, helpful, and engaging. She loves teaching and children and it shows! She invests in each student and sets them up for success. The texts were awesome and even my CT uses them. I love her! You will too. 100000% recommend!!!

Class is easy, just do the work. Do not turn in assignments late, its 20% taken off final grade. Class time is usually a discussion or activity on what to expect as a teacher and how to deal with it. One of the few useful classes in the program. At the end she has a few previous students come in and share their experiences as first year teachers.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Boyd is a nice person. She is someone who will tell you that if you don't submit all your assignments in on time you won't pass the class (this is true because there were some students retaking her class). She does have a lot of assignments but they are pretty easy to complete. The last assignment at the end is very stressful so start early!

Professor Boyd has been one of my favorites, if not favorite professor at KSU. She is extremely helpful inside and outside of class and really cares for her students. Her assignments are some what tedious but are fun to do and easy to receive a good grade. I highly recommend Boyd. I feel like I can go to her for anything! Highly recommend!!!!!!

Professor Boyd has become a mentor and a friend. Her syllabus is easy to understand and her assignments are clear and worth while. She encourages communication-sharing our ideas and experiences so we can all learn from each other. I actually loved coming to her class(can't say that about other classes). She was one of the best parts of KSU.

This was by far my favorite course I have taken at KSU and the only class I actually liked coming to. I have learned so much in her class and will use all of this in my future classroom. Professor Boyd is an amazing person/professor. She understands we're stressed and just trying to make it to graduation. She is passionate and supportive. Love her

I really loved having Professor Boyd for this class. There were a lot of group projects, but they weren't hard. She's an easy grader & gives good feedback. This was my favorite course this semester. She is caring and easy to talk to. She grades papers right away and responds to emails quickly. I hope to take more courses with her my senior year.

Absolutely loved her. Her assignments were interesting and she shared lots of good information and ideas. If you show up to class, participate in discussions and turn in assignment, it will be an easy A. I plan to take more classes with her in the future. Definitely sign up for her section- I did because everyone raves about her. They were right.

Professor Boyd was amazing! She's so caring and I'd recommend taking her while you're student teaching. Her assignments were fairly easy though there was a lot of reading. The only thing I disliked about her class is she teaches from a K-2 perspective rather than all grades. Overall, it's a stress free class & an easy A.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Professor Boyd is one of the best teachers I have ever had. She expresses interest in all of her students in and out of the classroom. All the assignments we did in her class helped me to feel significantly more prepared to have my own classroom one day. It is important to read and participate in class discussions.

Dr. Boyd is an amazing professor. Her class was by far the most favorite during my 4 years at KSU. She provided awesome information and ideas that I will use in my future classroom. She was understanding and flexible- she really cared about us. Her assignments were clear and she explained each paper in detail. She really sets you up for success.

Professor Boyd came into the class after our original professor became sick. I am so glad she did! We were all so confused by the other professor and Mrs. Boyd was awesome. She told us exactly what we needed to do for each assignment. Everything became much clearer! She was so nice and knowledgeable. I cant wait to take another class with her.

She made her instructions Very clear, and, considering she wasn't our original professor, she was a breath of fresh air. She didn't make us feel stupid for not understanding (which was not the case with our other prof) and she was kind. She worked with us. Genuinely Wanted us to pass and gave us everything to help.

I'm a senior & about to graduate. Mrs. Boyd was by far the best professor I had during my 4 years at KSU. She gets to know you & cares. When we're swamped with papers & assignments for other classes- she gave us extra time. She is sweet & her class was always the highlight of my day. I learned so much from her & will be a better teacher b/c of her.

I loved taking her class. I learned a lot from her and she gave me so many great ideas for my classroom. There were lots of papers to write- but as long as you did them, you will get a good grade. She is very nice and cares about how you do in her class. She was also there for support when I had some personal issues and offered advice and hugs.

I took EDUC 2130 with Prof. Boyd. It was a hybrid course, and honestly, it was a very easy A. She grades very leniently, but there's a lot of work. As long as you do it, you can easily get an A. Since it was a hybrid, it was tough pacing the assignments, but I still managed to procrastinate and get an A. She is very nice and sweet when we met.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: This class was great. She provided fun activities to do each class. Attendance and participation points were easy to get. She told a lot of great stories from when she was in the classroom. You could tell she was an awesome teacher and is an awesome professor.. I am taking another class with her next semester.

This was an easy class if you did the discussion board assignments and papers when they were due. There were a few group papers too. She was nice and approachable and graded assignments quickly.  I enjoyed her class and would take another with her.

She is an amazing professor. She creates a warm, caring environment. She provides quick feedback on assignments- grades fairly and is helpful and positive. She made coming to class enjoyable. Mrs. Boyd is a breath of fresh air at KSU. I wish I could take every class with her.  Highly recommended.
Great professor! There was a group unit project, but as long as you do all the parts, it's not hard. Class is enjoyable, and you get points for attendance.
